document_data.name: Tharundar
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharundar''' was a [[Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was thin, sharp-looking, and had a long beard.
document_data.Relationships: Fellow [[Red Wizard]] [[Harnrim Starangh]] answered directly to him. Tharundar actively encouraged Harnrim calling on his wisdom, and told him it was a good thing.
document_data.Abilities: Harnrim considered Tharundar his superior in wisdom and power.
document_data.History: After the [[War Wizards]] raided the [[Rightful Conspiracy]]'s meeting in [[Marsember]] in the early spring of the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, Tharundar was consulted by Harnrim Starangh prior to a meeting with the Lady [[Joysil Ambrur]] of the same city, inquiring about any intelligence collected on that woman.
